Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits geofencing by digital advertisers at health care facilities
Summary: Prohibits digital advertisers from establishing a virtual "geofence" around a health care facility that enables the advertiser to send targeted advertisements to any cellphones or mobile devices that enter such health care facility; prohibits the delivery of digital advertisements to persons in a health care facility using geofencing technology.
LawCode: Add ยง396-aaaa, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting geofencing by digital advertisers at health care facilities
